replies.author: Scal
replies.txt_content:
标题: [Samllr_＆water#13]厉害了，我的哥——我7级了厉害了我的哥，我现在七级了...我可以末地玩了。QwQ
没锭了，刚刚为了骗上七级发了。
回复给人气和金粒，还有4人气和160金粒，先到先得，没了别怪我...

replies.author: Klace_Haue
replies.txt_content:
黑幻视角：
“厉害了我的哥，我可以去末地玩了“
刚刚为了骗上七级发了，这下可以重拾大号，然后相互刷分
还有4人气和160金粒，去末地拾荒一波

replies.author: 爱范希
replies.txt_content: 又诞生了一个七级的小水怪

replies.author: Wang_Funny
replies.txt_content: 无意义的水帖 毫无意义

replies.author: 幽儿~
replies.txt_content:
恭喜啊 我也快8级了XD





"I am the bone of my sword."
"Steel is my body and Fire is my blood."
"I have created over a thousand blades."
"Unknown to Death,Nor known to Life."
"Have with stood pain to create many weapons."
"Yet,those hands will never hold anything."
"So as I pray,Unlimited Blade Works."

replies.author: tzxwdu
replies.txt_content: 祝你早日能在末地发言~

replies.txt_content: 七级快乐 祝你快乐
